articles.author: Nisha Gopalan
articles.title: Apple's iPhone 17 Goes on Sale Globally With Reported Strong Demand for Pro Models - Investopedia
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 17 lineup went on sale Friday, with early sales of the devices across Europe and Asia reportedly drawing long lines amid strong demand—especially for the Pro models.
articles.content: <ul><li>Apple's iPhone 17 lineup went on sale Friday, with early sales of the devices across the U.S, Europe and Asia reportedly drawing long lines amid strong demandespecially for the Pro models.</l… [+2560 chars]
